phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom
Time passed, and the title of Wizard King has been passed down to the present day,
where the Wizard King still protects this kingdom
The Magic Knights have a total of nine squads under the Wizard King.
They are squads of mages trained in combat.
The band of heroes who risk their lives to protect the kingdom,
the Wizard King and the Magic Knights,
are what all citizens of the Clover Kingdom aspire to be.
Two thousand nine hundred and ninety-six...
Two thousand nine hundred and ninety-seven...
Two thousand nine hundred and ninety-eight...
Two thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine...
I am going to train... and train some more!
And I am going to get stronger and stronger!
I am going to become the Wizard King
and go back for Sister Lily!
Who would have thought that even Asta would do so well as a Magic Knight?
I guess it pays to live long.
Fifteen years ago, Asta and Yuno were abandoned in front of our church, and now...
Because of the money they send us monthly,
we were able to fix our roof,
and we will not be short on tatoes this winter!
Magic is everything in this world.
We have never had a Wizard King from this area,
nor anyone who is actually achieved greatness in the Magic Knights.
I sincerely hope that one of you will become the Wizard King someday.
for the awarding... of the grimoires!
Yuno received the legendary grimoire with the four-leaf clover.
I am going to become the Wizard King.
However, Asta, who had no magic...
Now to down some moguro leaf juice that I have not had in a while, since it
You little wretch with no magical powers!
I am going to become the Wizard King!
I do not even know how, but I was able to get one!
You are the pride of this village.
My Observation Diary of My Very Best Friend, Asta
The first time I encountered Asta was at the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.
He shone from the moment I laid eyes on him.
One of us is going to become the Wizard King.
I am going to show you just how much I have grown in six months...
What the heck are these birds?!
That is pretty bad, even for someone from the boonies.
Get away from me, you stupid birds!
The next exam shall be the last one.
You will engage in actual combat.
I have to stand out by fighting someone who looks strong.
You are willing to fight a loser like me?
Let us both give it our all and fight fair, so we can achieve our goals!
Bronze Creation Magic: Sekke Magnum Cannonball!
There is no need to hold back.
the Magic Knights so I can have a good time and avoid working hard.
I am here to work my butt off and become the Wizard King!
the magical power of a Magic Knights Squad captain?
You said earlier that you wanted to become the Wizard King, did not you?
Now that I am standing before you, do you still have the nerve
to say that you are going to be the Wizard King,
E-Even if I cannot join the Magic Knights today...
No matter how many times I fall,
no matter what anyone says to me,
I am still going to become the Wizard King someday!
I am telling you that I will let you join the Black Bulls.
I was not the only one who had realized Asta's brilliance.
That is how Asta became a member of the Black Bulls.
And as for Asta's childhood friend, Yuno...
All who wish to offer, please raise your hand.
I-I thought that only royalty and nobles could join the Golden Dawn.
I will take the best path to becoming the Wizard King.
Please allow me to join the Golden Dawn.
would also make him Asta's best friend's childhood friend.
That would mean Yuno and I are also best friends.
My Observation Diary of My Very Best Friend's Best Friend, Yuno
I guess I will write my entry for today.
My dearest friend Asta was working hard again today.
B-But my heart belongs to Sister Lily.
What the heck are you doing, you jerk?!
This kind of heat is nothing to a member of the Black Bulls!
I want to add cold water.
Hanging out naked really is great.
He is been like that ever since our first mission.
When we had to hunt that wild boar.
And when we finally got to Saussy Village, we ended up running into those weirdos.
Do you think you can protect those beasts now?
You have no chance of winning.
Why will not you give up?
If I give up, who is going to protect them?
It is not just because of our promise.
I am going to become the Wizard King
What does he think would have happened to him if I was not there?
Well, I mean, I guess there have been times where I thought he
may have actually done a good job.
That is not what I meant!
Why would I care about that shrimpy little peasant?
I will throw enough at him from the both of us!
I am going to make that girl, that weakling, disappear!
Like hell I will let that happen!
I do not have any magic,
I do not really get it, but I did it!
I mean, at least he was okay, but...
Hey, Asta... D-Do you have anyone that you like?
There is somebody I have got my heart set on!
If you have got your heart set on me, do not make me worry so much.
How long have you been standing there?
I just got back from training!
What are you up to, Noelle?
Tonight's mission will be a bit rough.
Is your body back in tip-top shape, Yuno?
If your wounds still have not healed
Bringing along someone who is wounded would slow us down.
It is not as though I am actually worried about Yuno!
I was just thinking it would be nice to ride on my broom tonight...
There is no reason to hold back.
It will not take that much more magic to carry you two.
Oh, I am not holding back.
The thought of not wanting to be seen on that ship by anyone I know
You are not allowed to act without permission!
If you will excuse me, too.
I do not have any time to waste.
But you are the one who gave me hope.
Even if you are poor, an orphan...
We can become greater than anyone else in this world.
To make Sister and everyone else happy...
Let us see who can become the Wizard King!
It is Not as Though I am Actually Worried
It is Not as Though I am Actually Worried.
Yes, he is brushing each tooth carefully, with short strokes, ten to twenty times.
You must not scrub so roughly!
The bubbles are heading toward his eye!
He is not kicking off his blanket and getting too cold, is he?
You are so kind, it is almost creepy, Klaus.
I feel like all we ever do lately is take time off.
I am going to play with Rebecca's younger siblings, then!
Black Clover, Page 30: The Mirror Mage.
I am going to play with all I have got!
